sfField.formula: IF(OR( echosign_dev1__PasswordProtectSign__c, echosign_dev1__PasswordProtectPDF__c), IF( LEN(echosign_dev1__EncodedPassword__c) > 0, 'Password has been set', ''),'')

sfField.summary: Check this option if you also need to sign this agreement. Then select if you sign first or if your recipients sign first.
sfField.t: I also need to sign this document

sfField.summary: Send an automatic weekly or daily reminder to recipients.
Host signing to get in-person signatures from your computer or device.
sfField.t: Host signing for the first signer

sfField.summary: Select the language of the recipients.

sfField.formula:
IF( AND(LEN(echosign_dev1__ErrorMessage__c) > 0, ISPICKVAL( echosign_dev1__Status__c , 'Draft')), 
 IMAGE('https://secure.echosignforsalesforce.com/images/salesforce-error.gif', 'Error') & ' ' & echosign_dev1__ErrorMessage__c, 
 IF( AND(LEN(echosign_dev1__SignedPDF__c) > 0, ISPICKVAL( echosign_dev1__Status__c , 'Signed')), 
 HYPERLINK( echosign_dev1__SignedPDF__c , IMAGE('https://secure.echosignforsalesforce.com/images/salesforce-pdf-icon.gif', 'PDF') & ' ' & Name & ' - signed.pdf'), 
 ''))

sfField.summary: Preview the document or drag and drop form fields or signature fields on to the document before it is sent for signature.
This field stores the Record ID for any records converted from the unmanaged package.
Specify the number of days until the agreement expires and can no longer be signed.
Send an extra copy of signed agreement to these email addresses.

sfField.formula: IF(AND(LEN(echosign_dev1__SignedPDF__c) > 0, OR(ISPICKVAL( echosign_dev1__Status__c , 'Signed'),ISPICKVAL( echosign_dev1__Status__c , 'Approved'))), HYPERLINK( echosign_dev1__SignedPDF__c , IMAGE('https://secure.echosignforsalesforce.com/images/salesforce-pdf-icon.gif', 'PDF') & ' ' & Name & ' - signed.pdf'), '')

sfField.summary: (Optional) Enter a list of comma separated Attachment IDs in the order to be displayed.

sfField.formula:
CASE(
 TEXT(echosign_dev1__Status__c), 
 'Waiting for Counter-Signature', 'Out for Signature', 
 'Pre-Send', 'Not Yet Sent for Signature',
 TEXT(echosign_dev1__Status__c))

sfField.summary: Set this field to force the EchoSignAgreement and EchoSignAgreementAdvanced pages to rebuild the related Recipient List using the Lookup fields on the Agreement record.

sfField.t: Send written signatures to fax number

sfField.summary: Specify a message to the recipients.
The signed PDF that is sent to all parties is encrypted and this password will be required to open it. Don't lose the password as it is not recoverable.
Specify the date when the agreement expires and can no longer be signed.
